title: Cassiopeia is so desperate for a skin ...
body:

Damn, I never got around to watch all of that. Ran out of time at around S01E06, and totally forgot about it when I woke up next morning.

I must repent!
wait their selling 12 beast at barnes and noble brb

Yeah, only 3 volumes are out right now, but Okayado is doing both art and story for his mangas, so it may take some time but it will be well worth the wait. Just ordered volume 9 of Monster Musume.

And they got other awesome Manga that you can get as well. [Barnes and Noble's Manga site](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/u/manga/). That is a direct link to their Manga version of their site. You can find SO many different mangas through that.

Cass who? We need more {{champion:103}} and {{champion:1}} and {{champion:55}} skins.
Wrong thread to ask for an Annie skin buddy... (even as a joke)
why?

Because the OP was referencing a harem anime with lots of ...near... sexual activity.

Annie is a child (not matter how cruel she can be).  Most of the skins people are suggesting here are other references to said anime, making it seem like yours is intended to be as well.
O_O I didn't know.

It's ok, most people wouldn't. xD

If you see an anime character with at all large of breasts, just assume there's something sexual related to it.

edit: though I do admit it was less clear with this post.

As long as Riot doesn't pull another "spend $300-400 on chests to collect 10 random gemstones to unlock a specific skin" scheme ever again .... I am down with any new skins for any given champion. But seriously, for Riot to make us suffer by needing 10 of the rarest items in the gambling business of chest loot to get 1 skin is .... freaken scummy.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

The bigger boobs would help.

As would the cuter face/hair.

Not sure if to laugh or to cry, because you notice the boobs.
My summoner name means I'm not allowed to go without posting such a comment.
Well...they're always a good thing right? I was talking about her...uh... assets.
I'm sure others were too without mentioning it.

You mean she'll even take a skin from an overrated anime? 
.


.



.


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} And now I wait.

I guess I did try to start a flame war...no idea why. Guess late nights I get a little too board...on the boards...kill me. But It just wasn't that enjoyable. Kind of predictable. I guess that would of been a better way to put it than to say all that. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I can't really say that Monster Musume is overrated when I, a gay guy, watched and loved it...
It just felt too obvious as an anime to me. I probably could of worded that a bit better...and not put that bit of flame in there.
Oh I assumed you were joking, but as I thought about it, I realized that it must be pretty good if I enjoyed it.  Then again, I find fanservice absolutely hilarious rather than cringey.
That's literally the point of the anime, and it embraced it.
